save_dir.description: Save directory where TensorBoard logs will be saved.
save_dir.title: Save Dir

name.description: Experiment name. Default: ``'lightning_logs'``. If empty string, no per-experiment subdirectory is used.
name.title: Name

version.description:
Experiment version. If not specified, logger auto-assigns next available version.
If string, used as run-specific subdirectory name. Default: ``None``.
version.title: Version

log_graph.description:
Whether to add computational graph to tensorboard. Requires model.example_input_array to be defined.
Default: ``False``.
log_graph.title: Log Graph

default_hp_metric.description:
Enables placeholder metric with key `hp_metric` when logging hyperparameters without a metric.
Default: ``True``.
default_hp_metric.title: Default Hp Metric

prefix.description: String to put at beginning of metric keys. Default: ``''``.
prefix.title: Prefix

sub_dir.description:
Sub-directory to group TensorBoard logs. If provided, logs are saved in
``/save_dir/name/version/sub_dir/``. Default: ``None``.
sub_dir.title: Sub Dir

additional_params.description: Additional parameters passed to tensorboardX.SummaryWriter. Default: ``{}``.
additional_params.title: Additional Params
